description: Ubuntu Kreative Village is an innovative initiative located in Tuala, Kenya, focused on environmental conservation and community empowerment. The project promotes agroforestry, biodiversity, and sustainable practices while providing educational opportunities for local residents. By cultivating native trees and fostering a green community, Ubuntu Kreative Village aims to create a self-sufficient ecosystem that benefits both the environment and the people, ultimately inspiring similar projects in surrounding areas.
name: Ubuntu Kreative Village
